sentences.en: A permanent cure will only be effected by acupuncture, chiropractic or manipulation.
sentences.cn: 只有针灸、脊椎指压治疗或者推拿术才能实现彻底治愈。

sentences.en: Acupuncture can be useful in helping you give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 针灸对帮助你戒烟可能有用.

sentences.en: Acupuncture has a harmonizing and energizing effect on mind and body.
sentences.cn: 针灸具有协调和激活身心机能的功效。

sentences.en: Acupuncture has been used as medical means since antiquity in China.
sentences.cn: 针灸在中国自远古以来就被用作医疗手段了.

sentences.en: Acupuncture treatment has enabled many mutes to speak.
sentences.cn: 针剌疗法使许多哑人获得了讲话能力.

sentences.en: Acupuncture treatment is gentle, painless, and, invariably, most relaxing.
sentences.cn: 针灸疗法柔和，无痛，而且总是令人非常放松。

sentences.en: Acupuncture was practised in China as long ago as the third millennium BC.
sentences.cn: 中国早在公元前3,000年就已开始采用针灸疗法。
他用针灸疗法治愈了她.

sentences.en: How many acupuncture points are there in the human body?
It's known that acupuncture originated in China.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,针灸起源于中国.

sentences.en: She is reading a new work on acupuncture.
sentences.cn: 她正在看一本关于针灸疗法的新书.

sentences.en: Therapies like acupuncture do work and many people have been healed by them.
sentences.cn: 针灸等疗法确实有效，已经治愈了很多人。

sentences.en: What do you think of acupuncture?
sentences.cn: 你认为针灸 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Why not give acupuncture a whirl?
Written records show that acupuncture dates back to the Song Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 文字记载表明,宋朝就已经有了针灸.

trans.tran_en: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pushing special needles into parts of the body
